title: 123. Disinfecting Robot For Restaurants | Ava Robotics Autonomous UV-C Light
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Youssef Saleh, the founder and chief executive officer of Ava Robotics. Barron and Saleh explore food safety solutions via robotics and other developing technologies.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
